messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] OT / Harry Potter casting
messages.msgSnippet: Well, there s going to be at least four HP movies.  They just recently choose the new director
messages.messageBody:
<<I heard that there was only going to be three movies made.>>

Well, there's going to be at least four HP movies. They just recently choose the new director for Goblet of Fire.

Pam L.

From Sci-Fi Wire:

Mike Newell, the British director of Four Weddings and a Funeral, will direct the fourth Harry Potter movie, Warner Brothers Pictures announced officially over the weekend, the Associated Press reported. Newell will begin work on Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire in April 2004, the wire service reported.

Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban, the third film in the series, is currently in production under the direction of Alfonso Cuaron, and the studio said that as the two productions will overlap, it was not feasible for him to direct both, the wire service reported.

Newell, 61, also directed Donnie Brasco and recently completed Mona Lisa Smile with Julia Roberts, the AP reported.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] OT / Harry Potter casting
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/31/03 03:01:07 PM Central Standard Time, ecsamhill@earthlink.net writes: I will be sad if they recast any of those parts before finishing
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/31/03 03:01:07 PM Central Standard Time,
ecsamhill@... writes:
I will be sad if they recast any of those parts before finishing the 7th
movie. But it's possible that the actors will start to look too old.

One of the Rosencrantz and Guildenstern actors (Gary Oldman) is going to
be Sirius Black in Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban.

Betsy
############

Are they actually going to make all seven books into movies??? I heard that
there was only going to be three movies made.
~Nancy

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] OT / Harry Potter casting
messages.msgSnippet: **Harry Potter reads much more merrily for me now with the actors faces and voices in my head.** I think the casting for HP was great, especially the 3
messages.messageBody:
**Harry Potter reads much more merrily for me now with the actors' faces
and voices in my head.**

I think the casting for HP was great, especially the 3 friends. (Even
if Ron isn't tall with a long nose.)

I will be sad if they recast any of those parts before finishing the 7th
movie. But it's possible that the actors will start to look too old.

One of the Rosencrantz and Guildenstern actors (Gary Oldman) is going to
be Sirius Black in Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban.

Betsy
